name: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest - Heroes and Maps Pack
name_original: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest - Heroes and Maps Pack
description:
The Lord of the Rings: Conquest - Heroes and Maps Pack is a game developed by Pandemic Studios. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
The Lord of the Rings: Conquest - Heroes and Maps Pack is available on PlayStation 3.
